title: #162 The Mackenzie Poltergeist of Greyfriars Kirkyard
itunes:title: #162 The Mackenzie Poltergeist of Greyfriars Kirkyard
description:
Film Review: The Mist (2008)


Visit our WEBSITE 


Subscribe to our PATREON 


Subscribe to our YOUTUBE CHANNEL


Visit our MERCH STORE


Sources: 


https://www.spookyisles.com/greyfriars-kirkyard/


https://www.spookyisles.com/bluidy-george-mackenzie/


https://allthatsinteresting.com/greyfriars-bobby


All of the eyewitness accounts in this episode are taken from the book The Ghost that Haunted Itself, The Story of the Mackenzie Poltergeist – The Infamous Ghoul of Greyfriars Graveyard by Jan-Andrew Henderson


The bulk of this story is adapted from a fantastic article on the website Spooky Isles written by MJ Steel Collins and published on the 26th of December 2017.


The Powerful Story Of Greyfriars Bobby, The Most Loyal Dog In History By Erin Kelly | Checked By Erik Hawkins Published April 8, 2022 (allthings interesting)


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
